
## {{group}}


```{r}
#| include: true
#| eval: true
#| label: "fig-{{group}}-upset"
#| fig-cap: "UpSet plot for {{group_lb}}."
#| fig-width: 12
#| fig-height: 12
#| out-width: "100%"

group <- "{{group}}"
if (group == "all") {

  pdata <- samples

} else {
  pdata <- samples %>%
    filter(group == "{{group}}")
}

pdata %>%
  upset_wrap(c("v_call", "j_call", "cdr3"), "{{group_lb}}")


```
